info.title: Barong

parameters.description: State of API Key. "active" state means key is active and can be used for auth

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description: If set, returned values will be sorted in specific order, defaults to 'asc'.

parameters.description: Name of the field, which result will be ordered by.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of users per page (defaults to 100, maximum is 100).

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Topic of user activity. Allowed: [all, password, session, otp]

parameters.name: time_from
parameters.description: An integer represents the seconds elapsed since Unix epoch.If set, only activities created after the time will be returned.

parameters.name: time_to
parameters.description: An integer represents the seconds elapsed since Unix epoch.If set, only activities created before the time will be returned.

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: Result of user activity. Allowed: [succeed, failed, denied]

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of users per page (defaults to 100, maximum is 100).
